job_purpose: To play a senior role in the development of technical solutions for the implementation and support of specialized application software and interoperability.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Playing a senior role in the development of technical solutions for specialized application software and interoperability
Supervising Application Development team resources for effective and efficient delivery of quality ICT Application Services
Providing innovative solutions and technical expertise on application development projects
company_details: HSS is the Western Australian Government agency providing shared services to the state’s public health system. They offer financial, ICT, procurement and supply, and workforce services to over 65,000 employees across WA’s public health services and hospitals. HSS aims to support the health of all Western Australians by delivering excellent health care services.
